393. Info Values


Up: Defined Values and Handles Next: C Bindings Previous: Info Keys

The following info values are reserved. They are strings.
false
random
rar
raw
read_mostly
read_once
reverse_sequential
same_op
same_op_no_op
sequential
true
war
waw
write_mostly
write_once
